title: Observations upon a late libel, called A letter from a person of quality to his friend, concerning the Kings declaration, &c.
author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Satiric comments upon the Whig's reaction to the dissolution of the Oxford Parliament.
Attributed to Halifax, George Savile. cf. NUC pre-1956.
